mapper.select: select * from apply a inner join member b on a.midx=b.midx where tidx = #{tidx} order by a.apidx desc
mapper.update: update apply set checkYn="Y" where apidx = #{apidx}
mapper.select: select tidx, midx, checkYn,count(*) as cnt from apply where midx =#{midx} and tidx=#{tidx} group by tidx, midx,checkYn
